summary: War story of the 27th Panzers, Hitler's heavy-duty combat regiment composed of prisoners. In 1943, this motley tank crew is sent on a suicide mission behind enemy lines to destroy a Soviet train that's carrying fuel for the Red Army.
cast: Bruce Davison|David Patrick Kelly|D.W. Moffett|Jay O. Sanders|Keith Szarabajka|Oliver Reed|David Carradine|Branko Vidakovic|Slavko Stimac|Boris Komnenic|Andreja Maricic|Klaus Pagh|Anton Sosic|Svetislav 'Bule' Goncic|Gordana Bjelica|Irena Prosen|Lidija Pletl|Danica Maksimovic|Annie Korzen|Jelena Tinska|Vojka Cordic|Slavica Djordjevic|Nada Vojinovic|Svetlana Popovic|Gordana Les|Dragan Petrovic-Pele|Milenko Zablacanski|Goran Radakovic|Vladan Dujovic|Nikola Simijanovic|Dragan Bjelogrlic|Bogdan Jakus|Dragomir Stanojevic
title: Los panzers de la muerte
